bayou.file

Class FileByteSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • bayou.file.FileByteSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ByteSource

    public class FileByteSource
extends Object
implements ByteSource
    A source of bytes from a file.

    Example Usage: 

         ByteSource src = new FileByteSource("/tmp/data.bin");

     AsyncIterator.forEach( src::read, System.out::println )
         .finally_( src::close );
    Each FileByteSource depends on an AsynchronousFileChannel, obtained from a FileByteSource.ChannelProvider.

      • skip

        public long skip(long n)
          throws IllegalArgumentException,
                 IllegalStateException
        Try to skip forward `n` bytes.
        Specified by:
        skip in interface ByteSource
        Parameters:
        n - number of bytes to skip; n >= 0.
        Returns:
        number of bytes (m) actually skipped. 0 <= m <= n.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if this source is closed.
        IllegalArgumentException - if n < 0.
